sourcesContent:
import React ,{Component} from 'react' export default class IssuePage extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { issue:[], backendServer: 'http://localhost:8080/', id:this.props.match.params.id, } }; componentDidMount(){ fetch(this.state.backendServer +"issue/"+ this.state.id) .then(response=>response.json()) .then((data) => { this.setState({ issue:data, }) }) .catch(console.log) } render(){ console.log(this.state) return(
{this.state.issue.map((issue) => (
{issue.issueId}
))}
) } }
